speakersYaml.name: Joshua Jay Herman
speakersYaml.biography: By day I am a Python Developer working on currency trading infrastructure with Bank of America. By night and weekends I am trying to make an open source conversational AI that allows for open ended conversations and situations. I used to work in various industries such as Trade Show Websites, CRM, distributed and private ledger technologies, recommender systems for cryptocurrencies and as a Research programmer at UIC in the social network analysis lab.

talks.title: How to Make Friends and Influence Users with Huggingface
